# gravicore Provider



## Example Usage

```terraform
terraform {
  required_providers {
    asm = {
      source  = "gravicore/gravicore"
      version = "1.0.1"
    }
  }
}

provider "gravicore" {
  region = "us-east-1"
}
```

## Schema

### Required

- `region` (String) The region where AWS operations will take place.
